title: Handle a Container with a Customs Hold
description: A truck arrives to pick up a container, but the system shows it has a hold placed on it by customs.

tasks.description: Verify the container has a 'Customs Hold' status in the TOS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Clerk confirms the system shows a hold and the container cannot be released.

tasks.description: Inform the driver that the container is on hold and cannot be picked up.
tasks.expected_outcome: Clerk clearly explains the situation to the driver.

tasks.description: Advise the driver to contact the cargo's customs broker to resolve the hold.
tasks.expected_outcome: Clerk provides the correct instructions for the driver/broker to clear the hold with customs.
